Description: Fragment of limestone wall-relief showing a man carrying a bow and with an axe held in his belt; to the left was another figure of which only the back of the kilt and leg and part of the arm remains. Between the figures is a vertical line of hieroglyphs containing the name Mentuhotep.
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM Part 6: Plate 22 PM II (2): p.385
